thread.title: Judith Hartwig

author: Judith Hartwig
title: Judith Hartwig
text:
I was really happy with the choice of items available, and I was happy that the basket I ordered was delivered on the day of my Mum's birthday as requested.
I had given extra instructions to leave the basket with the next door neighbour if there was no one home. The neighbour is always home, so my Mum would not have to travel to the post office to pick up her gift.
Unfortunately the basket was not left with the neighbour, so my Mum had to travel to the post office to pick up her basket. This was something I had deliberately taken steps to avoid, and I was a bit disapointed that the delivery message had not reached the driver....It was not written on the package.
Apart from that - I was happy with the whole experience.
